kernfrasen: Life is not a land journey; it’s a sea journey
darkness is on the face of the deep
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A PERILOUS SEA VOYAGE

kernfrasen: I’m going to pay for your sins
God is a means to an end
if I do this, then you’ll do this

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer views life as inherently unstable and dangerous.
theologische_implicaties: Human agency is insufficient for salvation; external rescue is required.
ethische_implicaties: Humility and dependence on God rather than self-reliance.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May lead to fatalism or a view of the world as purely evil/chaotic.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the dead 'life is a journey' metaphor by specifying the 'sea' vs 'land' distinction, re-activating the sensory fear of drowning.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon centers on the 'Storm' as the unifying source domain, linking physical weather, political oppression, and spiritual alienation.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Storm' becomes the 'Storm of Divine Justice' (wrath), allowing the physical narrative to carry the weight of the atonement doctrine.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'I AM' statement by contrasting it with the 'Get back' schema of the Old Testament.
sterktes.voorbeeld: My I-Am-ness will kill you... but he says, 'Don’t be afraid.'

risicos.beschrijving: The 'Prosperity Gospel' is critiqued as a literalization of God as a vending machine or tool.
risicos.voorbeeld: God is a means to an end.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may realize they treat God as an object rather than a person.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The Sea of Galilee during a hurricane-force squall.
sub_worlds: The modern life of a missionary trainee

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: Strongly bridges the ancient text to the hearer's current self-perception.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Emphasizing the 'uncontrollable force' and the 'I AM' name.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Highlighting Jesus' refusal to be made king by force.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as the 'Untamed Lord' who sets the agenda.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits a traditional 'Service of the Word' focusing on Exegesis and Application.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the JOURNEY (Sea) and MILITARY (Resistance/Control) domains. It successfully moves from a concrete physical event to a deep psychological and theological reality. The preacher uses the 'Storm' as a master-metaphor for everything from cancer to the wrath of God.

revitalisatie_suggesties.huidige_status: Mentioned but overshadowed by the storm.
revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Connect the 'breaking' of bread more viscerally to the 'breaking' of the boat or the 'breaking' of the body in the storm.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The bread was torn to feed the 5,000; his body was torn in the storm of the cross.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The transition between 'Uncontrollable Force' and 'Wonderful Counselor'.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the 'Eye of the Storm' metaphor to show how the center of the force is the place of peace.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Suggests humans have no control over their destination.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Clarify the role of 'rowing' (human effort) as necessary but insufficient.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To provide a sense of 'foundation' against the 'fluidity' of the sea.
alternatieve_domeinen.doel_concept: The Church as the 'Boat' that is a 'Building on the Water'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge biblical narrative with systematic theology (Christology and Atonement).

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Instead of just admiring the 'walking on water' imagery, CMT reveals how this image restructures the hearer's view of 'control'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'Storm' to 'Sin' rather than just the experiential learning cycle.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals that the 'Prosperity Gospel' is actually a category error in metaphorical mapping (treating a Covenant as a Commercial Contract).

appendices.notities: The use of the 'Jonah' typology is a brilliant example of 'Metaphorical Intertextuality'.
